thread.title: Rich Get Richer as Google and Facebook Dominate Web Ads
thread.title_full: Rich Get Richer as Google and Facebook Dominate Web Ads

title: Rich Get Richer as Google and Facebook Dominate Web Ads
text:
Rich Get Richer as Google and Facebook Dominate Web Ads Twitter, Yahoo!, LinkedIn are distant rivals. Programmatic advertising isn’t helping things. By Tiernan Ray Updated Oct. 3, 2015 1:49 a.m. ET 
If you’re thinking of starting your own for-profit Website these days, prepare for disappointment: The world of online advertising is coalescing into a duopoly of the strongest ad sellers, Facebook and Google. 
Ad buyers are more and more choosing the two names they know, leaving little money for anyone else. 
That bodes well for...
